___history.description: The history dir (relative to the pwd).

___src.description: Input go files(Glob), expand with env first. ie ~/movie/non-mp4/**/*.{mp4,mkv,avi,flv}

___outputOptions.description: Ffmpeg output options, in k-v mode ie '-vf scale=640:360'.

___dist.description: The output dir (relative to the pwd).
